author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 249 drunk driving cases were booked against offenders in Thoothukudi district on Friday and 112 cases booked till late evening hours on Saturday.

Superintendent of Police Ashwin M. Kotnis said here on Saturday that over 700 liquor bottles were seized and 19 cases were booked against the offenders, he said.

In Tirunelveli district, 1,400 liquor bottles were seized since the district administration enforced a ban on selling liquor on account of Tiruvalluvar Day on Saturday. As many as 330 drunk driving cases were booked in the rural areas in the district and 175 such cases in Tirunelveli town, said Superintendent of Police V. Vikraman. Twenty cases were booked by Prohibition and Enforcement Wing of Tirunelveli.

He said that ‘Kaanum Pongal’ was celebrated peacefully by people across the district. People thronged the dam sites in the district.
title: 249 drunk driving cases booked
